title: North Korea criticizes South Korea’s ‘excessive’ pro-US policy: ‘Will be nightmare if…’
description:
North Korea criticized South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol’s pro-US policies, calling them radical and excessive after the leader’s recent trip to Washington. North Korean leader Kim Jong Un. (AP)

Concerns of Yoon’s obsequence is growing in international society, North Korea’s official Korean Cent...
